CustomField.description: This shows the closed date in specified format ex. December 10, 2019
CustomField.formula:
CASE(MONTH( DATEVALUE( ClosedDate ) ),
1, " January", 2, " February", 3, " March", 4, " April", 5, " May", 6, " June", 7, " July", 8, " August", 9, " September", 10," October", 11," November", 12," December", " ") + " " + TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE( ClosedDate ))) + ',' + " " + TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE( ClosedDate )))
CustomField.label: Closed Date Formula
